mdRecord.dcterms:title: Home treatment for colds kit
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: American Druggists Syndicate, Inc.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Front of the box reads "A.D.S., Home Treatment for colds, Price $1.00, American Druggists Syndicate, Inc. New York, N.Y." Four objects are inside the box: one unopened can of Aseptum for oral hygiene, a palatable preparation containing sodium perborate; ADS Laxative Cold Remedy box; a jar of ADS Thermo-Rub, External application for chest colds and head colds; and a tube of Ephedrine nasal compound; there is also a paper containing several ADS advertisements.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medicine
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
